readOnlyMode.description: Always open source members and IFS files in read-only mode. Content on the server can not be changed.

autoClearTempData.description: Automatically delete temporary objects from the temporary library on startup.

sourceFileCCSID.description: The CCSID of source files on your system. You should only change this setting from `*FILE` if you have a source file that is 65535 - otherwise use `*FILE`. Note that this config is used to fetch all members. If you have any source files using 65535, you have bigger problems.

enableSourceDates.description: When enabled, Code for IBM i will retain/update source dates of members when editing source members. Requires SQL to be enabled for this feature to work. If this config is changed, you must reconnect to the system.

encodingFor5250.description: The encoding for the 5250 emulator. To use the 5250 emulator, tn5250 must be installed on the remote system via yum.

terminalFor5250.description: The terminal type for the 5250 emulator. To use the 5250 emulator, tn5250 must be installed on the remote system via yum.

connectringStringFor5250.description: The connectring string for the 5250 emulator. To use the 5250 emulator, tn5250 must be installed on the remote system via yum.

debugPort.description: Port to connect to IBM i Debug Service.

debugSepPort.description: Port to connect to IBM i Debug Service for SEP.
